page.title: 13CORNISH WRESTLING
page.content: I started Wrestling when I was 9 years old. In the 3 years I have been wrestling I have won the best young wrestler award twice,and the school cup once, and came second in the under 14's and 16's. The Cawley's are the trainers, Jerry Cawley is the heavy weight champion of Cornwall. In Cornish wrestling the most common throw is a back, where you need 2 hips and 1 shoulder on the floor. This is a winning throw. The referees are called sticklers, and are former wrestlers.We practise on the playing field once or twice a week.
